reviews.name: Everybody Hates Chris: The Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This dvd got great moents on there that woould have you bust out laughing. Hope that everyone enjoys it as much as I did!
reviews.title: 15 October 2008

reviews.name: Everybody Hates Chris: The Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: We can't tell if it's our DVD player software on our computer, or the DVD itself, but the sound goes in and out a little while watching it. We've had the same thing happen with other DVDs, but not all of them. That's why we THINK it's the DVDs and not the player, just not sure. The order arrived on time so that was good, however the plastic "rings" in the middle of the disk holders were broken so the DVDs don't stay in. VERY annoying. It was packed in an envelope instead of a box so it was no doubt damaged in route.
reviews.title: Sound iffy; plastic rings in holder broken

reviews.name: Everybody Hates Chris: The Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun show, you'll laugh each time you watch!
reviews.title: Everybody Hates Chris: The Third Season
